project_descr: ENHANCING ACCESS TO JUSTICE AND DEVELOPMEMT OF A CHILD-FRIENDLY JUSTICE SYSTEM IN GEORGIA

outputs.output_title: UN JP on Access to Justice
outputs.output_descr: Overall objective of the project is to enhance capacities of government institutions to promote access to justice for all and qualitative, coherent and child-friendly justice system for children in Georgia.
